General.Name: Times Guaranty Limited
General.Description: Times Guaranty Limited, a non-deposit accepting non-banking financial company, provides investment and financial services in India. It also provides retail and corporate lending, merchant banking, money market related, and portfolio management services. The company was formerly known as Times Guaranty Finance Limited and changed its name to Times Guaranty Limited in December 1999. Times Guaranty Limited was incorporated in 1989 and is based in Mumbai, India. Times Guaranty Limited is a subsidiary of Bennett, Coleman & Company Limited.
